snippet.title: Black Mesa: Blue Shift | Captive Freight Trailer
snippet.description:
Black Mesa: Blue Shift will recieve Captive Freight update including chapter 4 and various improvements over all 3 previous chapters on December 10, 2022!

Black Mesa: Blue Shift is being developed by HECU Collective
_________________

CREDITS
Trailer made by ALLAN:
https://www.youtube.com/AllanOfficial
Soundtrack for trailer composed by Paweł Perepelica:
https://www.youtube.com/@GoldScrTv
https://twitter.com/weirdsoutherner
_________________

LINKS
Our Discord:
https://discord.gg/uhdTxP5Cuw

https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-blue-shift-remake
Black Mesa: Blue Shift in Steam Workshop:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2424633574

SUPPORT US

https://www.patreon.com/Hecu_collective
Your support really matters to us.

#remake #blueshift #blackmesa #halflife
